name: Color Viruses: King Pop.
description:
WARNING!!! Viewers Satirical Discretion is advised.

  • (Not) The best mobile game of the year!!!
  • Exceptional gameplay - click on your screen like never before!!!
  • Ten minutes of the most standard and repetitive game experience!!!
  • One easy-peasy wave for those who are against HARDCORE!!!
  • Four merciless waves for real HARDCORE ADRENALINE MACHINES!!!
  • Be ready to face strong, yet predictable enemies!!!
  • You should POP ‘em all before they’ll get you!!!
  • Challenge yourself and your friends or don’t!!!
  • Discover if your fingers are capable enough to defeat the MAIN BIG KING BOSS ENEMY and save the humanity!!!

WARNING!!! Now it's serious.

  • Read “Tips” to stay focused and prepared.(Serious and important)
  • Remember to check out “How to play” if you’re stuck somewhere throughout the game.
  • Be gentle with your screen, DO NOT BRAKE IT.

Peace  to everyone.
